title: Surprising Fit for the Two
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Alright, this is Maru’s book recommendation zura.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Okay, this is my recommendation!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>....A fashion magazine?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>What is this thick book?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>It’s a story that will give colors to your everyday zura. It’s truly full of life zura.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eeeh~,  but magazines can give colors to your life too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Hmph....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hmph....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru will read your recommendation, so read mine too, okay, Kasumi-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Fine! Make sure you also read mine properly, Maruko!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>*Sniff*.... That was a good story....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru suddenly wants to go shopping for clothes and cosmetics zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Maruko, give me more recommendations!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Kasumi-chan, please go shopping with me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
